title: VMware Workstation Player Portable
description:
Portable version of VMware Workstation Player.

It comes with 3 executables:
  # VMware Workstation Player (run).exe: Makes all changes needed to run VMware Workstation Player, then run it.
  # VMware Workstation Player (clean).exe: Reverts all changes made on the computer by the first executable.
  # VMware Workstation Player (run & clean).exe: Makes all changes needed to run VMware Workstation Player, then run it and clean everything up when VMware Workstation Player is closed.

The last executable is the most portable of the three, but the first one is faster on subsequent runs.

All of the three executables need administrator permissions to run.

To update VMware Workstation Player Portable, just put the installer of the newer version on the Update folder, and it will update itself the next time it runs
